alert.note: Alert for Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Walker and Dade Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near South Pittsburg to near Hammondville, and moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Stephensville, Center Post, Rising Fawn, New England, Morganville, Hooker, Cloudland Canyon State Park, Cooper Heights, Cole City and Wildwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northwestern Georgia.
